00076 /* NPP_GetMIMEDescription() and NPP_GetValue() are called to determine
00077  * the mime types supported by this plugin. */
00078 char*
00079 NPP_GetMIMEDescription(void)
00080 {
00081     log_entry("NPP_GetMIMEDescription");
00082     return("application/x-blender-plugin:blend:Blender 3D web plugin");
00083 }
00084 
00085 NPError
00086 NPP_GetValue(
00087     NPP instance,
00088     NPPVariable variable,
00089     void *value
00090     )
00091 {
00092     NPError err = NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00093     
00094     log_entry("NPP_GetValue");
00095 
00096     switch (variable) {
00097     case NPPVpluginNeedsXEmbed:
00098         log_entry("NPP_GetValue::NPPVpluginNeedsXEmbed");
00099         *((PRBool *)value) = PR_TRUE;
00100         break;
00101     case NPPVpluginNameString:
00102         log_entry("NPP_GetValue::NPPVpluginNameString");
00103         *((char **)value) = "Blender";
00104         break;
00105     case NPPVpluginDescriptionString:
00106         log_entry("NPP_GetValue::NPPVpluginDescriptionString");
00107         *((char **)value) = "Player for interactive 3D content";
00108         break;
00109     case NPPVpluginWindowBool:
00110         log_entry("NPP_GetValue::NPPVpluginWindowBool");
00111         *((PRBool *)value) = PR_FALSE; //not windowless
00112         break;
00113     case NPPVpluginTransparentBool:
00114         log_entry("NPP_GetValue::NPPVpluginTransparentBool");
00115         *((PRBool *)value) = PR_FALSE; // not trasparent
00116         break;
00117     default:
00118         err = NPERR_GENERIC_ERROR;
00119     }
00120     return err;
00121 }

00142 NPError 
00143 NPP_New(
00144     NPMIMEType pluginType,
00145     NPP instance,
00146     uint16 mode,
00147     int16 argc,
00148     char* argn[],
00149     char* argv[],
00150     NPSavedData* saved
00151     )
00152 {
00153     BlenderPluginInstance* This  = NULL;
00154     int i = 0;
00155     int retval = 0;
00156 
00157     log_entry("NPP_New");
00158     
00159     if (instance == NULL)
00160         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00161     
00162     instance->pdata = NPN_MemAlloc(sizeof(BlenderPluginInstance));
00163     if (instance->pdata == 0)
00164         return NPERR_OUT_OF_MEMORY_ERROR;
00165     
00166     This = (BlenderPluginInstance*) instance->pdata;
00167     This->browser_instance = instance;
00168     This->pID = 0;
00169     This->blend_file = 0;
00170     This->temp_mail_file_name = 0;
00171     This->main_file_store = 0;
00172     This->display = NULL;
00173     This->window = 0;
00174 
00175     /* Parse the options from the file. Should I do this in the
00176      * implementation file maybe? Now we do a lot with
00177      * instance-specific data. */
00178     /*
00179     while (i <argc ) {
00180         if (!strcmp(argn[i],"src")) {
00181             The blend file to load. 
00182             int url_len = strlen(argv[i]);
00183             if ((url_len > 0) && (url_len < 4096) ) {
00184                 This->blend_file = NPN_MemAlloc(url_len + 1);
00185                 if (This->blend_file == 0)
00186                     return NPERR_OUT_OF_MEMORY_ERROR;
00187                 strcpy(This->blend_file, argv[i]);
00188                 
00189                 retval = NPN_GetURL(This->browser_instance,
00190                             This->blend_file,
00191                             NULL);
00192                 if (retval != NPERR_NO_ERROR) {
00193                     log_entry("Cannot read animation");
00194                     NPN_Status(instance, "Cannot read animation file");
00195                     This->blend_file = NULL;
00196                     return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00197                 }
00198                 else {
00199                     log_entry("Animation loaded");
00200                 }
00201             }
00202         }       
00203         i++;
00204     }*/
00205         
00206     if (This != NULL) {
00207         return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00208     }
00209     else {
00210         return NPERR_OUT_OF_MEMORY_ERROR;
00211     }
00212 }

00215 NPError 
00216 NPP_Destroy( NPP instance, NPSavedData** save )
00217 {
00218     BlenderPluginInstance* This;
00219 
00220     log_entry("NPP_Destroy");
00221 
00222     if (instance == NULL)
00223         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00224 
00225     This = (BlenderPluginInstance*) instance->pdata;
00226     printf("NPP_Destroy ID:  0x%x %d\n", This->window, This->window);
00227 
00228     if (This != NULL) {
00229 
00230         if (This->pID != 0) {
00231 #ifdef WITH_PRIVSEP
00232             kill(This->pID, SIGTERM);
00233 #else 
00234             kill(This->pID, SIGKILL); //if I have to kill blenderplayer directly I need to send SIGKILL
00235 #endif
00236             wait(This->pID);
00237             unlink(This->temp_mail_file_name);
00238         }
00239 
00240         // sometimes FF doesn't delete it's own window...
00241         //printf("%s\n", NPN_UserAgent(instance));
00242         /*if (This->display != NULL && This->window != 0)
00243             XDestroyWindow(This->display, This->window);
00244         */
00245         if (This->blend_file) NPN_MemFree(This->blend_file);
00246         if (This->temp_mail_file_name) NPN_MemFree(This->temp_mail_file_name);
00247         if (This->main_file_store) NPN_MemFree(This->main_file_store);
00248         NPN_MemFree(instance->pdata);
00249         instance->pdata = NULL;
00250     }   
00251 
00252     return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00253 }

00256 
00257 NPError 
00258 NPP_SetWindow( NPP instance,NPWindow* window ) 
00259 {
00260     BlenderPluginInstance* This;
00261 
00262     log_entry("NPP_SetWindow");
00263 
00264     if (instance == NULL)
00265         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00266 
00267     /* window handle */ 
00268     if ((window == NULL) || (window->window == NULL)) {
00269         return NPERR_NO_ERROR; /* mmmmmm  */
00270     }
00271     
00272     if (window->ws_info == NULL)
00273         return NPERR_NO_ERROR; /* mmmmmm  */
00274 
00275     This = (BlenderPluginInstance*) instance->pdata;
00276 
00277     if (This) {
00278         This->window = (Window) window->window;
00279 
00280         NPSetWindowCallbackStruct* window_info = window->ws_info;
00281         This->display = window_info->display;
00282 
00283         printf("ID window 0x%x %d\n", window->window, window->window);
00284         return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00285     }
00286     else {
00287         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00288     }
00289 }

00292 NPError 
00293 NPP_NewStream(
00294     NPP instance,
00295     NPMIMEType type,
00296     NPStream *stream, 
00297     NPBool seekable,
00298     uint16 *stype
00299     )
00300 {
00301     //NPByteRange range;
00302     BlenderPluginInstance* This;
00303 
00304     log_entry("NPP_NewStream");
00305     
00306     if (instance == NULL)
00307         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00308 
00309     This = (BlenderPluginInstance*) instance->pdata;
00310 
00311     if (!This) 
00312         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00313 
00314     printf("Loading main file %s (%s)\n", stream->url, type);
00315     if ( strcmp(type,"text/html") == 0 ) // original HTML file 
00316         return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00317     
00318     This->stream_total = stream->end;
00319     This->stream_retrieved = 0;
00320     This->main_file_store = NPN_MemAlloc(stream->end*sizeof(unsigned char));
00321     if (!This->main_file_store) {
00322         fprintf(stderr, "Blender plugin: Out of memory! "
00323             "Cannot get chunk for loading animation.\n");
00324         return NPERR_OUT_OF_MEMORY_ERROR;
00325     }
00326 
00327     This->main_file_stream = stream;
00328 
00329     return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00330         
00331 }
00332 
00333 
00334 /* PLUGIN DEVELOPERS:
00335  *  These next 2 functions are directly relevant in a plug-in which
00336  *  handles the data in a streaming manner. If you want zero bytes
00337  *  because no buffer space is YET available, return 0. As long as
00338  *  the stream has not been written to the plugin, Navigator will
00339  *  continue trying to send bytes.  If the plugin doesn't want them,
00340  *  just return some large number from NPP_WriteReady(), and
00341  *  ignore them in NPP_Write().  For a NP_ASFILE stream, they are
00342  *  still called but can safely be ignored using this strategy.
00343  */
00344 
00345 int32 STREAMBUFSIZE = 0X0FFFFFFF; /* If we are reading from a file in NPAsFile
00346                    * mode so we can take any size stream in our
00347                    * write call (since we ignore it) */
00348 
00349 int32 
00350 NPP_WriteReady(
00351     NPP instance,
00352     NPStream *stream
00353     )
00354 {
00355     BlenderPluginInstance* This = NULL;
00356     int acceptable = 0;
00357     
00358     log_entry("NPP_WriteReady");
00359 
00360     if (instance == NULL)   
00361         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00362 
00363     This = (BlenderPluginInstance*) instance->pdata;
00364 
00365     if (This == NULL)   
00366         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00367 
00368     /* Check whether buffers already exist: */
00369 
00370     if ((This->main_file_stream && This->main_file_store)) {
00371         acceptable = STREAMBUFSIZE;
00372     }
00373     
00374     
00375     return acceptable;
00376 }
00377 
00378 
00379 int32 
00380 NPP_Write(
00381     NPP instance,
00382     NPStream *stream,
00383     int32 offset,
00384     int32 len,
00385     void *buffer
00386     )
00387 {
00388     BlenderPluginInstance* This = NULL;
00389     int accepted = 0;
00390     
00391     log_entry("NPP_Write");
00392 
00393     if (instance == NULL)   
00394         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00395     
00396     This = (BlenderPluginInstance*) instance->pdata;
00397 
00398     if (This == NULL)   
00399         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00400 
00401     
00402     if (stream == This->main_file_stream) {
00403         log_entry("NPP_Write: loading main_file_stream"); 
00404         memcpy(((unsigned char*)This->main_file_store) + This->stream_retrieved, buffer, len);
00405         accepted = len;
00406         This->stream_retrieved += len;
00407         if (This->stream_retrieved >= This->stream_total) {
00408             log_entry("NPP_Write: main_file_stream loaded"); 
00409             execute_blenderplayer(This);
00410         }
00411     }
00412     else {
00413         /* the stream ref wasn't set yet..*/
00414         log_entry("NPP_Write: not main stream"); 
00415         log_entry(stream->url);
00416 
00417         accepted = len;
00418     }
00419 
00420     return accepted;
00421 }

00424 
00425 NPError 
00426 NPP_DestroyStream(
00427     NPP instance,
00428     NPStream *stream,
00429     NPError reason
00430     )
00431 {
00432     BlenderPluginInstance* This = NULL;
00433 
00434     log_entry("NPP_DestroyStream");
00435 
00436     if (instance == NULL)
00437         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00438     This = (BlenderPluginInstance*) instance->pdata;
00439 
00440     if (This) {
00441         if (reason != NPRES_DONE) {
00442             if (stream == This->main_file_stream) {             
00443                 // stream destroyed by NPP_Destroy
00444                 NPN_Status(instance, "Cannot read animation file");
00445                 //main_file_failed(This->application);
00446             }
00447         }
00448         return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00449     }
00450     else {
00451         return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00452     }
00453 
00454 }

00467 void 
00468 NPP_Print(NPP instance, NPPrint* printInfo ) 
00469 {
00470     
00471     log_entry("NPP_Print");
00472     if (printInfo == NULL)
00473         return;
00474     if (instance != NULL) {
00475         if (printInfo->mode == NP_FULL) {
00476             printInfo->print.fullPrint.pluginPrinted = FALSE;
00477         }
00478         else {  /* If not fullscreen, we must be embedded */
00479         }
00480     }
00481 }

00484 void
00485 execute_blenderplayer(BlenderPluginInstance* instance)
00486 {
00487 
00488     char file_name[] = "/tmp/blender.XXXXXX";
00489     int fd = mkstemp(file_name);
00490 
00491     ssize_t real_size = write(fd, instance->main_file_store, instance->stream_retrieved);
00492     close(fd);
00493 
00494     instance->temp_mail_file_name = NPN_MemAlloc(strlen(file_name) + 1);
00495     strcpy(instance->temp_mail_file_name, file_name);
00496 
00497     instance->pID = fork();
00498     //XSelectInput(This->display , This->window, SubstructureNotifyMask);
00499     //XSync(This->display, FALSE);
00500     
00501 
00502 #if defined(WITH_APPARMOR)
00503     const char* executable = "blenderplayer-web"; 
00504 #elif defined(WITH_PRIVSEP)
00505     const char* executable = "blenderplayer-wrapper";
00506 #else   
00507     const char* executable = "blenderplayer";
00508 #endif
00509 
00510     if (instance->pID == 0) {              // child
00511         char window_id[50];
00512         sprintf(window_id, "%d", instance->window);
00513         //exit(0);
00514 #ifdef WITH_PRIVSEP
00515         execlp(executable, executable, file_name, window_id, (char*)NULL);
00516 #else 
00517         execlp(executable, executable, "-i", window_id, file_name, (char*)NULL);
00518 #endif
00519     
00520     }
00521     else if (instance->pID < 0) {           // failed to fork
00522         printf("Failed to fork!!!\n");                  
00523     }
00524 
00525     /*XEvent e;
00526     int started = 0;
00527     while (!started) {
00528         XNextEvent(This->display, &e);
00529         printf("Event type %d\n", e.type);                  
00530         if (e.type == MapNotify) {
00531             started = 1;
00532             XCreateWindowEvent event =  e.xcreatewindow;
00533             printf("Created window x:%d, y: %d, h: %d, w: %d\n", event.x, event.y, event.height, event.width);
00534         }
00535     }*/
00536 
00537 }

00540 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00541 
00542 static void
00543 log_entry(char* msg)
00544 {
00545 #ifdef NZC_GENERATE_LOG 
00546     FILE* fp = fopen("/tmp/plugin_log","a");
00547     if (!fp) return;
00548     fprintf(fp, "--> Unixshell:: %s\n",
00549         msg); 
00550     fflush(fp);
00551     fclose (fp);
00552 #endif
00553 }
